sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Papers from Scotland of transactions of the Scots Commissioners, concerning the King and the Parliament of England. Delivered at the convention of estates at Edinburgh. Also a conference by the Marquis of Arguile, the Earle Louderdaile, and the Lord Lothean, with the English Commissioners. And the proceedings of the Grand Committee of Estates, and the Commissioners of the Kirk of Scotland. Rosse, William.
[2], 6 p.
by Robert Ibbitson in Smithfield, neere the Queens-head Tavern, Printed at London : 1648. Feb. 23: Imprimatur, Gilb. Mabbot.
Signed at end: Wil. Rosse. Annotation on Thomason copy: "1647"; the 8 in imprint date is crossed out. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
Papers from Scotland of transactions of the Scots Commissioners, concerning the King and the Parliament of England. Delivered at the convention of estates at Edinburgh. Also a conference by the Marquis of Arguile, the Earle Louderdaile, and the Lord Lothean, with the English Commissioners. And the proceedings of the Grand Committee of Estates, and the Commissioners of the Kirk of Scotland. Rosse, William.
[2], 6 p.
by Robert Ibbitson in Smithfield, neere the Queens-head Tavern, Printed at London : 1648. Feb. 23: Imprimatur, Gilb. Mabbot.
Signed at end: Wil. Rosse. Annotation on Thomason copy: "1647"; the 8 in imprint date is crossed out. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Robert Ibbitson
Smithfield, neere the Queens-head Tavern
